committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to waive contributions to the military Survivor Benefit Plan in the case of certain persons whose military retired pay is reduced because of an offsetting increase in compensation paid to such persons by the Veterans' Administration due to an increase in disability rating.

summary.text: Amends the Survivor Benefit Plan to waive contributions by certain veterans whose military pensions are reduced because of an increase in disability compensation.
